activeTasks.title: Numerai — Full dataset era-boosting run
activeTasks.description: Running exp001 --mode full on 2.7M rows. Medium run showed Sharpe 0.145→0.557, corr +312%. Full run will give true comparison vs baselines.

recentlyCompleted.title: Numerai era-boosting medium run — early stopping fix confirmed
recentlyCompleted.summary: 50K rows: Sharpe 0.145→0.557, corr +312%, feature exposure -77%. Era std gate not met but all other metrics dramatically improved. Code committed and pushed.

recentlyCompleted.title: Blofin pipeline — confirmed smooth
recentlyCompleted.summary: Pipeline cron working with honest metrics. 12 T0→T1 promotions.
